title: Cloud Workspace Engineer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches as well as Swedish style snus online. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 180 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 You’ll join a well versed, “jack of all trades” team called the Solutions team, our scope is wide, reaching from e-com integrations, endpoint management, procurements to installing network equipment in our four warehouses. The solution department sorts under the Tech Department and works closely with multiple departments in the company and covers the gap outside of development and data engineering.
   

  

 As the Cloud Workspace Engineer in the Solutions team, you will be working with a wide range of departments, amazing co-workers, and a high variation of tasks. Your main objective is to ensure that our services, systems, and endpoints have the right configurations, properly maintained, compliant and secure. You will have the opportunity to drive a wide range of IT projects outside of the day-to-day tasks shared across the team.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, deploy, and optimize cloud workspaces leveraging Microsoft's cloud environment, including Azure AD, Office 365, and SharePoint.
* Implement and manage endpoint devices using Microsoft Intune, Microsoft Defender and Microsoft Purview for seamless device management and security.
* Configure and maintain Single Sign-On (SSO) federation across diverse platforms and applications.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate cloud workspaces with existing IT infrastructure.
* Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and best practices in cloud workspace engineering.
* Manage and execute internal IT projects related to the internal workspace,
* Ensuring services, systems, and endpoints are properly configured, maintained, compliant, and secure.


**Requirements**
* Proficiency in endpoint management using Microsoft Intune, Microsoft Defender, Microsoft Purview, and SIEM tools like Microsoft Sentinel.
* In-depth knowledge of Single Sign-On (SSO) federation protocols and technologies.
* Strong understanding of networking, security, and cloud architecture.
* Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field or relevant experience.
* Relevant certifications such as Microsoft 365 Certified: Enterprise Administrator Expert or similar are a plus.
* Ability to work 100% on-site or hybrid remote with a minimum of 3 days/week in the Stockholm office.


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *No Douchebags* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Viktoria Sobolewski at viktoria.sobolewski@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Site Reliability / Gitops Engineer
description:
This role is an opportunity for a hands-on, but literally hands-off, technologist with a passion for Linux to build a career with Canonical and drive the success with those leveraging Ubuntu and open source products. If you have experience of IT operations automation, Infrastructure as Code and a passion for technology, then you will enjoy working with some of the best people in the industry at Canonical.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 The IS team at Canonical supports and maintains all of Canonical's IT production services. The team is in charge of running services used by over 60 million Ubuntu users.
   

  

 As an SRE & Gitops engineer you'll be in a unique position to drive operations automation to the next level, both in our own private clouds as well as in the public clouds. We do this by utilizing the best of open source infrastructure as code software, software development practices such as CI/CD pipelines, and Canonical's leading products for software operation automation.
   

  

 In addition to defining the infrastructure as code, you will improve Canonical products and the open-source technologies they're based on by providing critical feedback to developers on how their products operate at scale. This is done by submitting bugs (and sometimes writing pull requests) and collaborating on design and implementations with other teams within the company.
   

  

 You'll be part of a global team of SREs that work together and support each other to provide the best possible services to our company, Canonical's customers and the Ubuntu Community.
   

  

 As a Site Reliability / Gitops Engineer engineer you will
   

  

* Apply your experience of IaC to develop infrastructure as code practice within IS by constantly increasing automation and improving IaC processes
* Automate software operations for re-usability and consistency across private and public clouds, taking into consideration the complexities of distributed systems
* Develop new features and improve the resilience and scalability of the existing cloud and container portfolio at Canonical
* Maintain operational responsibility for all of Canonical's core services, networks, and infrastructure
* Develop skills in troubleshooting, capacity planning, and performance investigation, Setting up, maintaining and using observability tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, and Elasticsearch; design, implement and maintain monitoring and alerting for various systems and services
* Collaborate with development teams to design service architecture, documentation, playbooks, policies and operational procedures
* Provide assistance and work with globally distributed engineering, operations, and support peers
* Be given uninterrupted development time to focus on larger projects and automation of manual tasks
* Share your experience, know-how and best practices with other team members in design sessions, mentorship and 'doing work together'
* Carry final responsibility for time-critical escalations


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* A deep experience of, and knowledge to define operations in code, using version control, peer review and CI/CD to roll out changes both to applications and infrastructure
* Strong modern engineering background (peer-review, unit testing, SCM, CI/CD, Agile)
* Python software development experience, with large projects
* Practical knowledge of Linux networking, routing, and firewalls
* Affinity with various forms of Linux storage, from Ceph to Databases
* Hands-on experience administering enterprise Linux servers
* Extensive knowledge of cloud computing concepts and technologies
* Bachelor's degree or greater, preferably in computer science or related engineering field
* Able to communicate clearly and effectively in English over email, chat, video or voice calls and in-person
* Motivated and able to troubleshoot from kernel to web, and willing to ask others when appropriate
* A willingness to be flexible and able to learn new things quickly
* Be inspired by the needs of fast-changing environments
* Happy to work within distributed teams
* Be passionate and familiarized about open-source, especially Ubuntu or Debian


 What we offer you
   

  

 Your base pay will depend on various factors including your geographical location, level of experience, knowledge and skills. In addition to the benefits above, certain roles are also eligible for additional benefits and rewards including annual bonuses and sales incentives based on revenue or utilization. Our compensation philosophy is to ensure equity right across our global workforce.
   

  

 In addition to a competitive base pay, we provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. Please note that additional benefits may apply depending on the work location and, for more information on these, you can ask in the later stages of the recruitment process.
   

  

* Fully remote working environment - we've been working remotely since 2004!
* Personal learning and development budget of 2,000USD per annum
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Parental Leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues at 'sprints'
* Priority Pass for travel and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm that is at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do.
   

  

 Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Work at Canonical is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game. Canonical provides a unique window into the world of 21st-century digital business.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Automation & DevOps Engineer
description:
**Uppdragsbeskrivning:**
 Wise IT söker en innovativ och driven Automation & DevOps Engineer till vår kunds IT-avdelning. Kunden är en ledande aktör inom modeindustrin med global närvaro, känd för sina innovativa och kreativa kollektioner. Rollen innebär att förbättra organisationens produktivitet och effektivitet genom automatisering och digitalisering av arbetsflöden samt säkerställa en sömlös integration mellan utveckling och drift.
   

  

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**
* Automatisera och strömlinjeforma operativa processer
* Hantera och stödja hybridmoln och relaterade IT-infrastrukturtjänster
* Utveckla och underhålla skript för automatisering och övervakning
* Delta i incident-, problem- och förändringshantering
* Säkerställa att kritiska system och tjänster är tillgängliga 24/7/365


**Kompetenskrav:**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom infrastrukturautomation, molntjänster och mjukvaruutveckling
* Avancerad kunskap om CI/CD-pipelines, Azure Biceps, Terraform och skriptspråk som Python, Bash och PowerShell
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure, Azure DevOps och M365-miljöer
* Kunskap om containerisering och orkestrering med Kubernetes och Docker
* Erfarenhet av Identity Access Management (SSO/SCIM) och ITSM-processer och verktyg
* Stark kommunikationsförmåga, analytisk och problemlösningsorienterad
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Språk:** 
 Svenska & Engelska
   

  

**Varaktighet:** 
 Interimslösningar på plats i början av augusti (7 respektive 12 augusti). Start i augusti/september i bästa fall.
   

  

**Vänligen ansök snarast med:**
* Ditt uppdaterade CV
* Timpris (inkl. omkostnader)
* Tillgänglighetsdatum
* En kort motivering varför du är lämplig för uppdraget


 Skicka din ansökan till Wise IT så snart som möjligt för att bli en del av ett engagerat team som arbetar med spännande och utmanande IT-projekt.

title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) Developer
description:
We are looking for an experienced developer with hands-on experience with cloud platforms and automation frameworks. If you enjoy working in an international environment in a role where your commitment and drive is highly valued- then this might be the right role for you! Apply for this position today as we apply ongoing selection!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 In Central Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 Upon agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Recruitment
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 Sometimes it's said that no day is like the other, and in this position, that's truly the case. As a Senior Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) Developer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our clients systems. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and maintain robust infrastructure and automation solutions. Your work will be divided equally between development and maintenance. You will also play a big role in developing and maintaining the security systems. The role will adapt to your previous experience, shaping itself around your existing knowledge and skills.
 


  


 You will be introduced into a welcoming environment and offered training and support from your colleagues. You will be a part of a team consisting of 4 other employees with the Software Engineer Manager as your direct supervisor.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* The opportunity to develop on a personal and professional level
  
* To become part of a large international company at the forefront of technology
  
* To become a part of a company that values innovation, commitment and drive
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Design, build, and maintain infrastructure to support the growing platform
  
* Develop and implement automation tools and processes
  
* Monitor system performance and proactively identify and resolve issues
  
* Stay current with industry trends and best practices in SRE and DevOps methodologies
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Strong programming skills in languages such as Python or Java
  
* Hands-on experience with cloud platforms, preferably GCP but AWS or Azure also works
  
* Experience in DevOps and automation frameworks such as Terraform and Kubernetes
  
* Fluency in English, both written and verbal. If you have knowledge in Swedish it is considered a merit
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Self-sufficient
  
* Problem solver
  
* Quality-oriented
  
* Adaptable
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
 



 When you apply to this application, you will get hired by our partner. This means that you can relax while we take care of the application process.
   




**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Sofia Axelsson or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on recruitmentstockholmsouth@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15104482

title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Senior Infrastructure Engineer
 



**Locations:** 
 London, Oslo, Stockholm, Tallin, Madrid, Barcelona, Lahore
 



**Working Model:** 
 Hybrid, with a 3 days in the office requirement
 



**Benefits:** 
 Private Health Care
 



  





**About Us** 




 Gelato has built the world's largest and most global network for on-demand production of customized items e.g. t-shirts, wall art, mugs, books, hoodies, and cards. We support a new wave of e-commerce entrepreneurs and the global shift towards local and more sustainable production.
 



 In many ways, we at Gelato are rethinking how digital fabrication of customized products can be done on-demand. Just imagine what will happen when we add 3D printing capabilities to this global service. We are already empowering thousands of e-commerce entrepreneurs to grow and scale their businesses.
 



  





**Gelato Technology** 




 We own no physical production assets, nor servers, instead our asset is a cloud based connectivity platform that enables world-class on-demand production for e-commerce platforms and applications. This engineered platform needs to provide our customers access to more than 130 production partners in 32 countries and includes production plate design, routing to an appropriate partner, finally linking to logistics’ systems for delivery to the consumer. All this in 72 hours and reaching more than 5 billion people and potential consumers in a smarter, faster, and greener way.
 



 The employed technologies range from backends using PHP and GoLang to mobile apps built natively or with hybrid technology, running on cloud services and with a modern CI/CD pipeline. Designing highly-available, fault-tolerant, cost-effective, scalable systems is our passion. We are using TDD, BDD, DDD principles and patterns, and agile methodology. Designing public API for millions of people, integrating with world-class third-party systems, and solving complex engineering problems (Graph, CAP, etc) are only a small glimpse into the tasks.
 







**About The Position** 




**What you will do** 



* **Innovate and Strategize:** 
 Design and implement strategic initiatives that propel Gelato's infrastructure forward, ensuring alignment with our rapid growth and innovation objectives.
* **Automate Everything:** 
 Be an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) champion, driving automation to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
* **Champion Reliability and Efficiency:** 
 Optimize our cloud infrastructure, ensuring maximum uptime, performance, and cost-effectiveness.
* **Collaborate for Success:** 
 Partner with Engineering to craft resilient cloud applications. Automate deployments, implement robust monitoring and alerting, and solidify our DevOps practices through IaC.
* **Embrace Availability:** 
 Contribute to our culture of continuous availability by participating in the on-call rotation, demonstrating your commitment to platform excellence.
* **Harness the Power of AI:** 
 Explore the use of AI to modernize our cloud production platform, unlocking new levels of insight and automation.
* **Optimize Through FinOps:** 
 Promote a FinOps mindset, ensuring we make conscious, data-driven decisions to optimize cloud costs.



**Who you are** 



* **Education & Experience:** 
 You hold a bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline, backed by at least 5 years of hands-on experience in cloud infrastructure, automation, and DevOps.
* **Cloud Mastery:** 
 You possess deep expertise in major cloud service providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) and a thorough understanding of cloud best practices. You're passionate about building scalable and efficient SaaS platforms.
* **DevOps Toolset:** 
 You have proven expertise in essential cloud DevOps automation tools like Kubernetes (K8s), Terraform, and Helm. Your experience drives seamless CI/CD pipelines, configuration management, and containerization for our SaaS environment.
* **Technical Fluency:** 
 You have working knowledge of programming languages like Python and Go, as well as modern platform development and infrastructure automation.
* **Problem-Solving & Collaboration:** 
 You are an exceptional problem solver, able to navigate complex challenges in fast-paced environments. Collaboration is key to your success as you work to deliver high-quality SaaS products within our production platform.



  





**What it’s like to work at Gelato** 




 We are a customer-obsessed team with the ambition to change the world by connecting technology to the printing industry and making it much more sustainable. Everyone who joins our team must feel genuinely intrigued and motivated by our mission. We expect a lot. We are a driven team with big goals, so we seek individuals who are genuinely passionate about their work and possess an entrepreneurial spirit. Our culture is unique and we live by our values, so it's worth learning more about our culture and how we work before presenting your application.
 



  





 At Gelato, we pride ourselves on our global presence with 16 offices worldwide, fostering a dynamic and diverse work environment. Rooted in a culture that values collaboration, creativity, and camaraderie, we actively cultivate a company culture that thrives on shared experiences. We encourage team members to embrace this culture by working from our inspiring office spaces at least three days a week, allowing for meaningful connections and collective growth.
 



  





 Lastly, we ask that you please upload your CV in
 **English** 
 , regardless of which country you are applying from.

title: Cloud Security Architect
description:
Zelly är ett ledande ”born-in-the-cloud” företag . Vi utvecklar och optimerar molntjänster från Microsoft och ser till att våra kunder har tillgång till de bäst lämpade molntjänsterna för deras verksamhet.
 



  





 Är du redo att ta Zelly´s säkerhetsarbete till nya höjder?
 



  





 Vi har stora ambitioner när det kommer till vår IT-säkerhetsarbete och vill därmed utöka vårt team med en Cloud Security Architect. Zelly är ett dynamiskt och snabbväxande Cloud-bolag som levererar alla Microsofts cloudplattformar. Vi tror på en Cloud first-approach och ser styrkan i att utnyttja synergier i Microsofts ekosystem. Zelly är den perfekta arbetsplatsen för dig som vill utvecklas, gillar att ta ansvar och kunna ha möjligheten att påverka din arbetsplats. Vi ser gärna att du är hungrig på ny teknologi, vill hjälpa kunderna till en bättre, enklare och säkrare vardag.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som Cloud Security Architect kommer du vara en viktig del i våra nya och befintliga kunders säkerhetsstrategi. Du är ansvarig för att proaktivt leda, motivera och utmana kunder i projekt och hjälpa dem att säkra verksamhet och användare. Vardagen kommer innebära mycket kontakt med kunder och arbetet varierar mellan allt ifrån pre-sale, arkitektur, specificera anpassningar och integrationer, till att hålla i workshops och utbilda kunderna. Du kommer jobba både självständigt och i team där din åsikt och erfarenhet kommer att vara betydelsefull, samtidigt som det finns kollegor att bolla med. Du kommer få vara med och driva hur arbetssätt och tjänster inom säkerhetsområdet ska utvecklas. Vi erbjuder en heltidstjänst som utgår från vårt kontor vid Gullmarsplan med frihet att arbeta från distans två dagar i veckan.
 



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av Active Directory, Entra ID, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Sentinel, Microsoft Defender XDR och Microsoft Purview
* 3-5 års erfarenhet av DevSecOps samt att implementera säkerhet i DevOps-miljöer
* Djupgående teknisk kunskap inom Microsofts olika säkerhetstekniker som används för att skydda identiteter, enheter och information samt för att upptäcka riskfyllda beteenden och hot
* Erfarenhet av Azure eller motsvarande cloudplattform och förståelse för säkerhetsprinciper för molnbaserade tjänster.
* Erfarenhet av att verka som rådgivare och tekniskt stöd till kund
* Erfarenhet av att fånga krav och omsätta i lösning
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska



  





**Vem är du?** 




 För att trivas hos oss tror vi att du är nyfiken på olika verksamhetsprocesser och kunders behov, intresserad av Microsoft cloud och dess utveckling, trivs med frihet under ansvar, är en lagspelare och gillar att utveckla rutiner och processer.
 



  





**Dina möjligheter hos oss:** 



* Bra villkor och stora utvecklingsmöjligheter i ett snabbt expanderande IT-bolag!
* Möjlighet till delägarskap i Aderian Group som är koncernen som Zelly ingår i
* Då vårt mål är att du ska bli bäst på molntjänster betalar vi gärna för din fortbildning inom detta. För när du utvecklas – utvecklas vi!
* Självklart erbjuder vi både förmåner och bonusar
* Roliga resor och aktiviteter tillsammans!



  





 Rekrytering sker löpande – där tillträde och lön sker enligt överenskommelse. Vi kommer genomföra bakgrundkontoroll som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.
 



  





 Känns detta som en tjänst för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag så kontaktar vi dig så snart som möjligt.
 



  





 Hoppas att vi hörs!

title: Marketing Assistant with event focus
description:
Join our dynamic team to drive event planning and marketing initiatives, enhancing our brand presence and customer engagement.



**Introduction**
----------------



The Smartoptics marketing team is small but mighty, consisting of our CMO and Digital Marketing Manager. We collaborate closely with the Sales team to generate leads through inbound marketing strategies and create successful events and exhibitions. Our key goals include generating leads both digitally and through events, and we use tools like HubSpot, Adobe Creative Cloud, LinkedIn, X, Facebook, and Google to achieve this. We organize significant events like our annual SmartConnect, which combines technical training, conferences, and engaging activities for our customers and partners.


**Position summary**
--------------------



As a Marketing Assistant at Smartoptics, you will play a crucial role in supporting our marketing initiatives and helping us plan, coordinate, and execute various events. You will be involved in both internal events for our employees and external events for our customers and partners. Additionally, you will support digital marketing activities, content creation, and lead generation efforts. Your organizational skills, creativity, and attention to detail will be essential in ensuring the success of our events and marketing activities.


**Education:**
--------------


* Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
* Relevant experience or internships in marketing preferred.
* Certifications in digital marketing or related areas are a plus.
* Proficiency with Adobe Creative Cloud, HubSpot, Google Analytics, and social media platforms.

**Required skills:**
--------------------


* **Event Planning -** Ability to organize and manage events from inception to completion, ensuring all logistical aspects are covered and the event runs smoothly.
* **Project Management -** Skilled in coordinating multiple tasks and stakeholders to deliver projects on time and within budget, maintaining a clear focus on objectives and deliverables.
* **Content Creation and Coordination -** Experience in developing engaging marketing content and coordinating with various teams to ensure consistency and alignment with brand messaging.
* **Social Media Management -** Proficiency in managing social media platforms, creating content, and analyzing performance to enhance our online presence and engagement.
* **Email Marketing -** Competence in creating, sending, and analyzing email campaigns to effectively communicate with our target audience and drive engagement.
* **Analysis and Reporting -** Ability to conduct market research, analyze data, and generate reports to inform marketing strategies and track the success of marketing initiatives.
* **Basic Design Skills -** Proficiency in using Adobe Creative Cloud to create visually appealing marketing materials.
* **Customer Interaction and Sales -** Strong communication skills and experience in customer service or sales roles, ensuring positive interactions and effective support for our clients and partners.

**Application Details**
-----------------------



We will be conducting interviews on a rolling basis until we find the candidate we wish to hire. If you are interested in joining our team, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.



Please note that applicants must have a Swedish/EU work permit. No relocation assistance or visa support will be provided. We kindly request no recruiters or agencies. If you are passionate about marketing and eager to contribute to a dynamic and innovative company, we would love to hear from you.


**About Smartoptics**
---------------------



Smartoptics provides innovative optical networking solutions for a new era of open networking. We focus on solving network challenges and increasing the competitiveness of our customers. Our customer base includes cable and telecom operators, cloud providers, Internet exchanges, governments and thousands of enterprises.



At Smartoptics, we leverage modern software design principles and expand network horizons by taking an open approach in everything we do. This empowers our customers to break free from unwanted vendor lock-in, remain flexible and minimize costs.



Our solutions based on open networking standards and protocols are used in metro and regional network applications as well as in metro access networks. The products we deliver are based on in-house developed hardware and software and enhanced by associated services.



Smartoptics is a Scandinavian company founded in 2006. We partner with leading technology and network solution providers and hold numerous certifications and approvals from major switching and storage solution providers such as Brocade, Cisco and Dell. We have a global reach through our salesforce and more than 100 business partners including distributors, OEMs and VARs.



As a challenger, we take pride in our open approach, smart design principles and ambitious customer service. We value inclusivity and prioritize the well-being of our employees. We foster a positive company culture and provide a supportive work environment.

title: Project Manager
description:
**Start****ASAP****Duration****4-6 months**
  
Emagine are now looking for a Project Leader for a New Voice Trading platform to one of our nordic banking clients.  

  

**Start date:** 2024-08-01

**End date:** 2024-12-31

**Location:** Stockholm 3days on site, 2 days remote

**Short description of the project status and background.**


Client is starting a project to replace the current BT voice trading system. The aim is to look into market leading vendors in the area and conclude what would suit the Nordea needs best.

**Main tasks the consultant(s) will be responsible for?**


Evaluate the available vendors, align business requirements, facilitate reference meeting/call and together with clients architect work on best proposed solution  

Collection of the business requirements and support in selection of the target platform for replacement of BT Phones.

**knowledge, certification and experience:**

* Knowledge in the voice trading area, and with products like IPC, Speakerbus, BT and Cloud9
* Voice trading platforms, good understanding of current market (MUST HAVE)
* Good experience with Cloud, on-prem and hybrid solutions
* Strong communicator, good experience in negotiations with business, procurement and technology stakeholders (MUST HAVE)
* Implementation experience of voice trading platform is a good benefit
* obliged to have experience from bank/finance industry (MUST HAVE)

  

Communication - VITAL - LEVEL 6
Project Manager - VITAL - LEVEL 6


Requirements Specialist - LEVEL 6

title: Junior Materialdeklarerare till Saab Surveillance
description:
Tog du nyligen examen inom kemiteknik och vill arbeta med materialdeklaration? Saab Surveillance söker nu en nyexaminerad materialdeklarerare med intresse för kompontenter.Rollen är kopplad till ett talangprogram som ger dig den ultimata övergången mellan studier och arbetsliv.
  
Att jobba som juniorMaterialdeklarerare hos Saab Surveillance
  
Som materialdeklarerare är du blir en viktig länk i vårt team.Du kommer att arbetai sektionen ”Material and process engineering” som ansvarar för Saabs material inom olika produktområden.Din huvuduppgift är att se till att de material Saab använder för sina olika komponenter uppfyller kunders krav. Dina dagar är varierade och du kommer att vara involverad i diskussioner och samarbeten med andra delar av verksamheten så som inköp, design, konstruktion och tillverkare för att säkerställa kvalitet och överensstämmelse.
  
  

**Dagliga arbetsuppgifter kan vara:**  

Stödja konstruktörer och systemingenjörer i valet av material och processteknik för konstruktion
  
Delta i utredningar om exempelvis materials korrosionshärdighet, lackvidhäftning ochhållfasthet
  
Nätverkamed leverantörer och knyta kontakter internt
  
  

Rollen är placerad i Göteborg.
  
  

Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att ge unga techtalanger den ultimata starten på arbetslivet. För denna roll kommer du att bli anställd av Nexer Tech Talent men arbeta hos Saab i Kallebäck med start efter sommaren.Du kommer även att få ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du får möjlighet att utveckla och fördjupa dina tekniska kunskaper i områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet,men även inom tex. ledarskap och personlig utveckling.
  
Du kommer att coachas av en mentor hos Saabsamt en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen och bjuds ofta in på gemensamma aktiviteter så som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter framgångsrikt genomförande av konsultuppdraget är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos Saab.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

Är i början av din karriär och har en civilingenjörsexamen i kemiteknik
  
Har ett intresse för teknik och för att förstå hur saker och ting fungerar
  
Som person ärdu kommunikativ, självständig och lösningsorienterad
  
Har goda kunskaper i svenska, såväl tal som skrift
  
Har goda kunskaper i materialteknik såsompolymerer, metaller, ytkemi.
  
Det är meriterande om du harerfarenhet av att jobba med databaser, SQL och Excel
  
  

För företag inom försvars- och säkerhetsindustrin i Sverige, kräver lagen att anställda som hanterar känslig information och teknologi ska vara svenska medborgare samt genomgå en säkerhetsprövning.
  
Ansökan
  
Låter detta som något för dig? Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, så skicka in din ansökan snarast möjligt. Om du har du frågor eller funderingar är du välkommen att kontakta Tech Recruiter Johanna Norman på johanna.norman@nexergroup.com
  
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
  
  

Om Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Tillsammans är vi över 2500 medarbetare i 15 länder som i mer än 35 år hjälpt våra kunder att ligga steget före både strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent här.
  
Om Saab Surveillance
  
Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 18 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare, mer hållbar och mer rättvis värld.
  
Sektionen är organiserad under affärsområdet Surveillance som erbjuder världsledande sensorteknik inom övervakning och beslutsstöd för att skydda mot hot. Portföljen omfattar luftburna, markbaserade och marina radarer, elektronisk krigföring, stridsledning, flygsystem och cybersäkerhet.

title: Engagement Manager till Addovation
description:
Vi vet att dagens kunder önskar mer än bara en bra produkt, tjänst eller pris. De förväntar sig en sömlös kundupplevelse där alla kontaktvägar är sammanlänkade och kontinuerligt stöd finns att tillgå. Addovation erbjuder därför våra kunder ett långsiktigt partnerskap genom en Customer Engagement-modell.


Addovation är mitt i en spännande tillväxtresa och vi är alltid intresserade av att knyta kontakt med potentiella nya kollegor, nu eller i framtiden.


Som Engagement Manager är du kundens främsta kontaktpunkt och säkerställer att våra tjänster och IFS-lösningar skapar långvarigt värde. Är du vår nästa Engagement Manager?

 **Vad du kommer göra**


I rollen som Engagement Managerarbetar du med att vidareutveckla relationerna med Addovations kunder. Du är den som har ett holistiskt perspektiv och förstår kundens önskade resultat samt leder arbetet med att stötta kunden under denna resa. Detta gör du genom att planera och leda de dagliga aktiviteterna samt säkerställa att våra kunder använder våra tjänster optimalt. Framgångsfaktorn ligger i att bygga långsiktiga partnerskap och identifiera nya möjligheter för att utöka samarbetet.

*Mer konkret kommer du att:*

* Vara kundens främsta kontaktpunkt
* Ta fram förslag på aktiviteter som är anpassade till kundens affärsstrategi och önskat resultat
* Planera och leda de dagliga aktiviteterna utifrån ett helhetsperspektiv
* Säkerställa kundnöjdhet
* Ansvara för kundlönsamhet (budget) och planera, leda och exekvera på kunduppdrag som skapar ett ökat kundvärde
* Identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter och säkra nöjd kundupplevelse

Till stöd i ditt arbete har du dina hjälpsamma kollegor inom Addovations olika affärsområden.

 **Är det här du?**
  

Idag arbetar du i en liknande roll eller kanske som projektledare inom IT-branschen med ett stort intresse för kundvård. Sannolikt har du även en relevant eftergymnasial utbildning. Från tidigare roller har du även erfarenhet av ERP- eller ekonomisystem. Har du arbetat med IFS Application/IFS Cloud blir vi extra glada.


Som person så beskriver du dig själv som relationsbyggare som drivs av att ha fokus på kund. Att identifiera kundernas behov och översätta dessa till lämpliga strategier och aktiviteter är något som du anser vara en rolig utmaning. Då du är den som säkerställer kundnöjdheten krävs det att du är flexibel, proaktiv och vill leverera kvalitet och högt värde till kunden.  

  



  

**Vilka är vi?**  

Välkommen till Addovation. Vi är ett nordiskt IT-tjänstebolag som är experter på affärs- och verksamhetslösningar som hjälper bolag att effektivisera sina processer. Utifrån kraftfulla system och plattformar som IFS, Oracle NetSuite och Microsoft Office 365 kan vi ta ett helhetsgrepp för att underlätta processerna inom våra kunders olika affärskritiska områden.


Team Addovation består idag av 200 rådgivare, experter och utvecklare som arbetar tillsammans för att skapa enkla och innovativa lösningar. Idag finns vi i Sverige, Norge, Finland och Sri Lanka. Vår styrka och framgångsfaktor är, hur klyschigt det än låter, våra fantastiska medarbetare.


Vi erbjuder dig spännande projekt och uppdrag som bidrar till att få våra kunder att lyckas och dig att utvecklas. Du blir del av ett engagerat och motiverat team som hjälper varandra när det behövs.

  

**Bra att veta!**  

Vi behandlar intresseanmälningar löpande men tar en semesterpaus mellan v.29-31.

IFS

Customer Engagement Manager

Göteborg, Stockholm

title: Projekt- och förändringsledare på SAP plattformen
description:
Våra kunder använder SAP som främsta affärssystem och där heter framtiden SAP S/4HANA Cloud. För att ta klivet dit behöver man hantera system, processer och människor. Tre pelare som tillsammans skapar nya möjligheter om man får med alla på båten. Som projekt- och förändringsledare spelar du en avgörande roll i just den uppgiften.
Klart att du ska hänga med!**Vad gör en projekt & förändringsledare på Stretch Evolve?**
Våra kunder finns framför allt i västra Sverige och spänner från mindre till de riktigt stora bolagen. Där genomför vi allt ifrån komplexa konverteringar av befintliga SAP ECC system till implementeringar av helt nya SAP system - från inget systemstöd alls.
Som projektledare hos oss blir utgångspunkten i ditt arbete att fokusera på användarupplevelsen oavsett plattform, insikt oavsett datakälla, samt enkelhet oavsett process eller system, men SAP är alltid en av komponenterna.
Att få leda en förändring där verksamheten från start är engagerad i hur utvecklingen ska se ut och vilka värden vi ska uppnå, det ger arbetsglädje!
**Vem är du?**
Som projekt & förändringsledare har du en bred förståelse för organisation och kunskap om olika domäner. Du har gärna erfarenhet av frågor som går över organisationsgränserna och du är nyfiken, kreativ och genuint intresserad av att utveckla dig själv som ledare och coach. Din stil är öppen, prestigelös och ödmjuk – i kombination med ett hejdundrande driv.
Vi ser också att du har erfarenhet
av att leda SAP ERP implementationer och förbättringsprojekt, från ECC eller S/4HANA Cloud.
av komplexa situationer som behöver hanteras ur olika perspektiv.
av att hantera konflikter och friktion mellan olika funktioner.
av Prosci eller annan förändringsmetodik
**Varför Stretch?**
Tillsammans gör vi störst skillnad på SAP-marknaden genom att våra lösningar används, ägs och utvecklas i och av verksamheten tillsammans med IT. Vi jobbar holistiskt - med team och hela projektleveranser, vi skapar våra egna produkter och vi rådgör kunder i deras beslut.
På Stretch Evolve får du kollegor som hjälper dig att växa, både professionellt och på det personliga planet. Vi är också mjukisar, som värnar om varandra. Och att dela med sig av sig själv är en naturlig del av vår kultur.  

  

Vill du tillhöra Sveriges bästa SAP-gäng? Hör av dig!
**Stretchgruppen**
**Stretch Evolve**
**Roll**
Projekt- och förändringsledare inom SAP
**Platser**

Hybridarbete

**Ulrica Wincent**
Stretch Evolve

title: Identity and Access Governance Manager
description:
**Identity and Access Governance Manager**  


Would you be interested in implementing technology solutions from scratch, acting as a trusted advisor to our internal stakeholders globally, and having a real impact on shaping the enterprise landscape within the ASSA ABLOY Group? Join our Security Identity and Access Control team in Malmö, Sweden. We're committed to delivering top-notch, data-driven, user-centric solutions to create a safer and more open world.  


**What you would do as our Identity and Access Governance Manager**  

As our Identity and Access Governance Manager, you will be a key driver for our global identity processes, IT access management services, and Information Security's ISMS compliance.  

You would also:
* Lead the Identity Governance and Administration (IGA) roadmap into the future.
* Align with Business, HR, and IT to establish cross-functional processes.
* Drive change by designing, implementing, and maintaining Identity Governance and Administration processes.
* Establish role-based access models under the principles of “least privilege” and “need to know” at the enterprise level.
* Monitore IGA processes, including applications and systems, and resolving or escalating issues as needed.
* Establish monitoring, facilitating assessments, audits, and certification activities for IGA compliance controls, as well as IGA reporting with business-relevant KPIs and KRIs.

  


**The skills and experience you need**  

We are looking for someone who:
* Holds a Bachelor's or Associate's degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Has several years of professional experience in IGA and service solutions (e.g., OKTA, Sailpoint, OneIdentity, Omada) in an enterprise environment.
* Possesses knowledge of business role and access modeling in enterprise organizations.
* Is capable of designing, developing, and deploying IGA processes within both on-premise and cloud-based environments for enterprise, B2B, and B2C settings.
* Has a committed, self-motivated, and creative personality with a hands-on mentality.
* Demonstrates excellent collaboration and communication skills in English; knowledge of Swedish is an asset.
* Understands Information Security control frameworks and regulatory compliance demands; certification is a plus.


Ideally, you would also have knowledge of Microsoft AD and AZURE AD Identity and Access Management Services and compliance monitoring capabilities, as well as identity provider services and integrations from Google, Apple, Meta, and others.  


  

**What we offer**  

We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
* The opportunity to grow your skills in a versatile way.
* Agile working.
* The opportunity to develop your career in a respected global group.
* Motivated and encouraging team around you.
* Wellness benefits.
* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.

A competitive salary and incentive schemes.  
* 

**We review applications regularly, so don’t wait:**  

We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply, no later than the 13th of August 2024. To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the recruitment process, please email Alexandra Kymäläinen, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at alexandra.kymalainen@assaabloy.com. Depending on the risk profile for the role, a background screening will need to be performed. Final candidates may therefore be a subject to a background screening. The performance of a background check is subject to consent and based on our Applicant Privacy Notice.  

  

  

Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!  

To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com  


**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**  

Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.
company_description: Let’s create a safer and more open world – together!

title: Datacenter Consultant till Telia Cygate
description:
Jag heter Ragnar Bylehn och jag ansvarar för vår konsultgruppering i Östergötland. Just nu letar vi efter dig som har god erfarenhet av att utforma, implementera och felsöka moderna hybrida server- och lagringslösningar. Är du vår nya kollega?


**Din nästa utmaning?**

Som Konsult inom Datacenter hos oss har du en viktig roll att vägleda våra kunder, hela vägen från att du föreslår lämpliga lösningar, till design, implementation och förvaltning. Då våra leveranser till kund ofta spänner över flera teknikområden, kommer du att arbeta tillsammans med kollegor som är specialiserade inom andra områden. Det tillsammans med vårt stora fokus på kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling gör att du kommer kunna ta stora steg i din personliga vidareutveckling.


Som konsult inom Datacenter jobbar du med flera olika serverlösningar och virtualisering (windows, Linux, VMware), samt lösningar inom lagring och HCI. Vi jobbar med spännande tekniker, där du också kommer arbeta med det senaste inom Cloud och automation.


**Vem är du?**  

Som person uppvisar du ett genuint intresse för att arbeta med våra kunder och hjälpa dem med deras utmaningar inom området. Vi tror att du söker dig till oss för att du vill känna tillhörighet i ett team, och du är lyhörd, öppen för att ta emot feedback och dela med dig av kunskap.  

  



**Dina erfarenheter:**

* Stor erfarenhet av att arbeta med olika serverlösningar och virtualisering (ex. Windows, Linux och VMware)
* God erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med olika lagringslösningar (ex. HP, Pure Storage)
* Erfarenhet av HCI-lösningar (ex. Nutanix, Simplivity, VMware vSAN)
* Förståelse och viss erfarenhet av Container-lösningar (Ex. Dockers, Kubernetes)
* Förståelse och viss erfarenhet av olika Cloud-lösningar (ex. Azure, AWS)
* Viss erfarenhet av automatisering

**Home of Experts**

Sedan 1978 är vi nördigast i IT-branschen och med nätverk och säkerhet i vårt DNA kan vi uppmuntra våra kunder att utforska möjligheterna med digitalisering och molntjänster på ett tryggt sätt. Sedan 2006 är vi också en del av Telia Company och det ger oss en stabil grund att stå på. Vi tar med oss kompetens och glädje till alla möten, för vi vet att idéerna som bidrar till de mest hållbara lösningarna hittar oss när vi känner oss trygga och har roligt tillsammans. Vi är generösa och inkluderande i relation till varandra och vi ser mångfald som en möjlighet.


**Intresserad?**  

Vi lovar att du kommer att börja en spännande resa hos oss samtidigt som du har mycket roligt på vägen. Placeringsort är Norrköping eller Linköping. Om du har några frågor så får du gärna kontakta mig Ragnar Bylehn på ragnar.bylehn @cygate.se.
  

  

**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of your next big opportunity!**

title: Machine Learning Engineers Wanted for Apotea's New AI Team | Stockholm
description:
**Join Apotea’s New AI Team!**

**Several Position**: Machine Learning Engineer & Senior Machine Learning Engineer

**Location**: Sveavägen 168, Stockholm, Sweden

**Reports to**: Chief AI Officer

*Prefer reading this job advertisement in Swedish?* ***Click here to read the Swedish version.***

 **About Apotea**


Join Apotea, Sweden's leading online pharmacy, with an annual revenue exceeding 6 billion SEK. We are building an AI team from the ground up and we are seeking passionate and driven individuals ready to leverage the power of AI and machine learning. If you're eager to make a significant impact and be part of a small technical team, we want to hear from you.

 **The AI Team**

* **Innovative Environment**: The AI organisation sits right under CEO Pär Svärdson, ensuring that your work has high visibility and significant influence.
* **High Impact**: With over 50+ identified use cases, your contributions will drive meaningful change and innovation throughout Apotea.
* **Growth Opportunities**: Play a pivotal role in shaping our AI strategy and enjoy ample opportunities for professional development, working across all stages of the ML lifecycle.

 **Your role as a Machine Learning Engineer at Apotea**:

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritise AI use cases.
* Develop and deploy machine learning models that solve real-world business problems.
* Continuously improve and optimise AI solutions to enhance performance and scalability.
* Contribute to the development of a robust AI infrastructure and best practices.
* Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning within the AI team.

 **What We’re Looking Fo**r


We’re seeking Machine Learning Engineers with diverse skills and a passion for solving complex problems. We are looking for three individuals with varying levels of experience, including senior, mid-level, and junior engineers. Ideal candidates will have experience building and deploying at least one AI application and have experience working across most stages of the ML lifecycle. We believe you have a broad skill set that includes most of the following skills:

* **Data Engineering**: Ability to manage and preprocess large datasets, with a solid understanding of data pipelines and ETL processes.
* **Data Science**: Experience with statistical modelling, data analysis, and algorithm development.
* **Software / ML Engineering**: Proficiency in at least one major programming language such as Python or Java, and familiarity with ML frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
* **Cloud Computing**: Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
* **Language Skills**: Proficiency in English or Swedish is required.

 **Recruitment Process**

* Apply
* Interview 1: Culture Fit
* Interview 2: Technical Capabilities
* Background Check: As a pharmacy, we always conduct a background check.
* Offer Presented

 **Application**

  

Do not hesitate to send in your application already today, we are working on appointing the entire new team as soon as possible.


For more information or questions, visit our career page or contact us at jobb@apotea.se. We do not accept applications via email.

If you're eager to make a significant impact and be part of a small technical team, we want to hear from you.

**The AI Team**

* **Innovative Environment:** The AI organization sits right under CEO Pär Svärdson, ensuring that your work has high visibility and significant influence.
* **High Impact:** With over 50+ identified use cases, your contributions will drive meaningful change and innovation throughout Apotea.
* **Growth Opportunities:** Play a pivotal role in shaping our AI strategy and enjoy ample opportunities for professional development, working across all stages of the ML lifecycle.

 **As a Tech Lead at Apotea, you will**

* Lead Technical Development: Oversee and guide the technical development of AI applications, ensuring high-quality and scalable solutions.
* Team Coaching: Provide technical coaching and mentorship to team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
* Architectural Design: Design and structure the architecture of AI applications, ensuring robust and efficient systems.
* Agile Leadership: Lead daily standups, sprint reviews, and manage escalations to ensure smooth project execution.
* Project Scoping: Scope and structure the development of applications, setting clear goals and timelines.
* Hands-On Coding: Engage in hands-on coding and development when time allows, contributing directly to the project.
* Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritise AI use cases.

 **What We’re Looking For**


We’re seeking a Tech Lead with diverse skills and a passion for solving complex problems. Ideal candidates will have experience coaching technical teams, building and deploying multiple AI applications, and working across all stages of the ML lifecycle. We believe you have a broad skill set that includes:

* **Technical Leadership**: Experience in scoping projects, coaching technical teams, and leading the technical delivery of AI applications.
* **Data Engineering:** Ability to manage and preprocess large datasets, with a solid understanding of data pipelines and ETL processes.
* **Data Science:** Experience with statistical modeling, data analysis, and algorithm development.
* **Software / ML Engineering:** Proficiency in at least one major programming language such as Python or Java, and familiarity with ML frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
* **Cloud Computing**: Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
* **Language Skills:** Proficiency in English or Swedish is required.

 **Recruitment Process**

* Apply
* Interview 1: Culture Fit
* Interview 2: Technical Capabilities
* Background Check: As a pharmacy, we always conduct a background check.
* Offer Presented

 **Application**


Do not hesitate to send in your application already today, we are working on appointing the entire new team as soon as possible.


For more information or questions, visit our career page or contact us at jobb@apotea.se. *We do not accept applications via email.*

title: Technical Service Manager to SEB
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.* **About The Role**
As a tech-savvy Service Manager in the Cloud Core Tribe, your primary mission is to serve as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for SEB's strategic 3rd party SaaS implementations. You will engage daily with representatives from the initiative and various teams within SEB, providing ongoing support throughout the initiative's journey. **You will help SEB to:*** Accelerate SaaS Adoption by coordinating secure and trusted integrations between SEB and third-party SaaS providers.
* Streamline Implementation by supporting technical onboarding and standardized capabilities (Golden Paths) to enable scalability.
* Establish and maintain necessary processes and Way of Working (WoW).

 **Your Key Responsibilities, but not limited to:*** Advise and coordinate strategic SaaS Initiatives.
* Secure alignment with internal strategies, guidelines, directives, and policies.
* Knowledge sharing.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams.


**To thrive in this role, we believe you have a solid background in:*** Cloud engineering or relevant experience in AWS, GCP, Azure.
* Stakeholder management and technical project delivery.
* Structured and focused on delivering business value.
* Problem-solving mindset and always willing to go the extra mile.
* Strong communication skills in English, both written and verbal.

 **Ready to join?**
Even though we will start the screening and interview phase at the end of August, we recommend that you apply today and no later than the 20th of August. If you have questions about the position, please contact Rasmus Hallberg, Talent Acquisition Partner, at rasmus.hallberg@seb.se  

Apply now and help shape SEB's cloud future! **SEB Podcasts**
Listen to our podcasts about working at SEB and how the bank strives to drive change.  

Help us create change.  

Data Engineer: https://open.spotify.com/episode/70IiBhmUYToxVjNaCN27rS?si=d5c895e56fd1433c
